TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DefaultHttpHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler, class System.Web.IHttpHandler
type DefaultHttpHandler = class interface IHttpAsyncHandler interface IHttpHandler

summary.span: 表示預設 HTTP 處理常式的屬性和方法。

span.span: Represents the properties and methods of a default HTTP handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A要求攔截已透過網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 6.0 和任何明確的繫結套用至要求的擴充功能時，物件會攔截 HTTP 管線中的內送要求。A object intercepts incoming requests in the HTTP pipeline when both request interception has been configured through Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 and no explicit bindings apply to the requested extension. 要求攔截可以設定透過 IIS 6.0 中所引進的萬用字元應用程式對應功能。Request interception can be set up through the wildcard application mapping feature introduced in IIS 6.0. 如需詳細資訊，請搜尋[MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)使用萬用字元應用程式對應，若要重新對應 URL 相關資訊。For more information, search the [MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118) for information about using wildcard application maps to remap a URL. 類別會實作介面，以提供非同步要求處理。The class implements the interface to provide asynchronous request processing. 一般的 HTTP 處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱[HTTP 處理常式和 HTTP 模組概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f540bdeb-d22e-4e1d-ba8a-fe6c9926283b)。For general information about HTTP handlers, see [HTTP Handlers and HTTP Modules Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f540bdeb-d22e-4e1d-ba8a-fe6c9926283b). 此外，如需詳細資訊，請參閱下列：Additionally, for more information see the following: - 建立非同步 HTTP 處理常式，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立非同步 HTTP 處理常式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b5c4a27-599b-44d0-8a06-72edc6765aa9)。About creating asynchronous HTTP handlers, see [Walkthrough: Creating an Asynchronous HTTP Handler](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b5c4a27-599b-44d0-8a06-72edc6765aa9). - 有關註冊 HTTP 處理常式，請參閱[如何： 註冊 HTTP 處理常式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5633f9a-03fb-4ccc-a799-dc67d656fa60)。About registering HTTP handlers, see [How to: Register HTTP Handlers](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d5633f9a-03fb-4ccc-a799-dc67d656fa60). 類別可以衍生自類別，以提供要求的自訂的處理。Classes can derive from the class to provide customized handling of requests. 非同步 HTTP 處理常式衍生自可以覆寫方法，以變更要求的處理方式。An asynchronous HTTP handler that is derived from the could override the method to change how requests are processed. A不會使用 ASP.NET 錯誤。A does not use ASP.NET errors. 現有的內容，會使用 IIS 錯誤或還有專利 ISAPI 自訂錯誤機制會運作不變。Existing content that uses IIS errors or a propriety ISAPI custom error mechanism would work unchanged. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作自訂的 HTTP 處理常式，藉由衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a customized HTTP handler by deriving from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DefaultHttpHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DefaultHttpHandler/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DefaultHttpHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DefaultHttpHandler/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 啟始對 HTTP 處理常式的非同步呼叫 (Asynchronous Call)。

span.span: Initiates an asynchronous call to the HTTP handler.

returns.span: ，包含處理序狀態的相關資訊。

span.span: An that contains information about the status of the process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立非同步使用的 HTTP 處理常式，當您的處理常式必須實作非同步和由 ASP.NET 以非同步方式呼叫的方法。When creating an HTTP handler for asynchronous use, your handler must implement the asynchronous and methods that are called asynchronously by ASP.NET.

exception.span: 處理要求的先決條件失敗，並且所要求的檔案有副檔名 .asp 或要求透過 POST 傳送。

span.span: The preconditions for processing a request fail and either the requested file has the suffix .asp or the request was sent through POST.

summary.span: 取得隨要求傳輸之要求標頭和要求值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of request headers and request values to transfer along with the request.
A containing request headers and values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回空集合，除非它衍生自的類別中填入類別。The property returns an empty collection unless it is populated in a class that is derived from the class. 新增的標頭會附加至要求中的標頭的集合，再將要求傳遞回至網際網路資訊服務 (IIS)。The headers that are added are appended to the collection of headers in the request before passing the request back to Internet Information Services (IIS).

summary.span: 當先決條件防止 物件處理要求時呼叫。

span.span: Called when preconditions prevent the object from processing a request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 前置條件由用戶端在要求標頭欄位中，並會在 Web 伺服器上評估。Preconditions are specified by the client in the request-header fields and are evaluated on the Web server. 比方說，藉由使用前置條件，用戶端可以防止要求的方法 （例如，GET） 套用至資源的一個的預定以外的資源。For example, by using preconditions, clients can prevent a requested method (for example, GET) from being applied to a resource other than the one intended. 詳細資訊，請參閱 14 」 標頭欄位定義 」 區段，在[都會使用超文字傳輸通訊協定，HTTP/1.1](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=73147) World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站上的規格。For more information, see section 14, "Header Field Definitions," in the [Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=73147) specification on the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site. 會呼叫方法，當先決條件防止處理要求的物件。The method is called when preconditions prevent the object from processing a request. 衍生類別可能會覆寫方法前置條件失敗時，會擲回例外狀況。A deriving class might override the method to throw an exception when the preconditions fail. 不會擲回例外狀況方法。The does not throw an exception in the method. 下列其中一項將會導致失敗的前置條件：Any of the following will cause the preconditions to fail: - 呼叫 。Calling . - 呼叫 。Calling . - 呼叫 。Calling . - 變更回應的快取原則。Changing the cache policy for the response. - 新增做為篩選條件以物件屬性。Adding a object as a filter to the property.

summary.span: 覆寫目前要求的目標 URL。

span.span: Overrides the target URL for the current request.

returns.span: 用於要求中的覆寫 URL，如果未提供覆寫 URL，則為 。

span.span: The overridden URL to use in the request; or if an overridden URL is not provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回`null`除非從衍生類別中覆寫類別。The method returns `null` unless it is overridden in a class that is derived from the class. 僅如果 ASP.NET 在 IIS 6.0 上執行背景工作處理序隔離模式中，而且回應不會修改之前，會呼叫方法呼叫物件。The method is called only if ASP.NET is running in worker process isolation mode on IIS 6.0, and if the response was not modified before the object was called. 回應是以下列其中一項修改：The response is modified by any of the following: - 呼叫 。Calling . - 呼叫 。Calling . - 呼叫 。Calling . - 變更回應的快取原則。Changing the cache policy for the response. - 新增做為篩選條件以物件屬性。Adding a object as a filter to the property.

summary.span: 讓 物件可以處理 HTTP Web 要求。

span.span: Enables a object to process of HTTP Web requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不以同步方式呼叫方法。The method should not be called synchronously. 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫來提供自訂的要求處理。Classes that are derived from the class can override the to provide customized request processing.

span.span: The is called synchronously.
